name: SubCloud
overview:
SubCloud is an enterprise file system that presents Amazon S3 as local file systems. SubCloud is a software product, not a storage service. It leverages your Amazon S3 storage. You are always in full control of your data.

SubCloud works just as well inside EC2 as it does outside EC2.

Application Integration Developers: Integrate your applications with Amazon S3 without writing a single line of code.

Infrastructure Integration Administrators: Integrate your IT backup and archive infrastructure with Amazon S3 immediately.

Shared Storage Workgroups: Setup Internet-scale shared drives with virtually infinite capacities.
